name: @johnowennixon/diffdash
description: A command-line tool to generate commit messages for staged changes using AI
author: John Owen Nixon

scripts.build: run-s -ls build:clean build:tsc build:shebang build:chmod && okay
scripts.build:chmod: echo 'Changing bin files to be executable' && chmodx --package
scripts.build:tsc: echo 'Transpiling TypeScript to dist (using tsc)' && tsc --erasableSyntaxOnly --libReplacement false
scripts.build:tsgo: echo 'Transpiling TypeScript to dist (using tsgo)' && tsgo tsc || (rimraf dist && false)
scripts.lint:biome: echo 'Linting with Biome' && biome check src
